statements: SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT quantity, product_name FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damage%';
SELECT id, product_name, return_date, quantity FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC, quantity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT product_name, return_reason FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, product_name FROM returned_products WHERE return_reason LIKE '%defective%'
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE quantity BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY id
SELECT product_name, quantity, return_reason FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date ASC
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT id, product_name, return_date FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, product_name, return_date, quantity FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY return_date;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_quantity FROM demand_forecast WHERE product_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, return_date, quantity FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2021-01-01' AND return_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, SUM(forecast_quantity) AS total_forecast FROM demand_forecast GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_forecast > 100;
SELECT product_id, product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_returned FROM returned_products GROUP BY product_id, product_name ORDER BY total_returned DESC;
SELECT product_id, AVG(forecast_quantity) AS avg_forecast FROM demand_forecast WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE returned_quantity > 5;
SELECT product_id, transaction_date, transaction_quantity FROM historical_data ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, forecast_date, demand_quantity FROM forecasted_demand WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-03-31';
SELECT product_id, MAX(returned_quantity) AS max_returned_quantity FROM returned_products GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM returned_products ORDER BY return_date DESC, returned_quantity ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_id, transaction_quantity FROM historical_data WHERE transaction_quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_quantity DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM forecasted_demand GROUP BY product_id HAVING total_demand > 5000;

SELECT r.product_id, r.return_date, f.forecast_date FROM returned_products r INNER JOIN forecasted_demand f ON r.product_id = f.product_id WHERE r.return_date > '2022-01-01' AND f.forecast_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT AVG(returned_quantity) AS avg_returned_quantity FROM returned_products WHERE returned_quantity IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM returned_products
SELECT product_id, quantity_returned FROM returned_products ORDER BY quantity_returned DESC
SELECT product_id, return_date FROM returned_products WHERE return_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT product_id, SUM(quantity_returned) AS total_returned FROM returned_products GROUP BY product_id
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_catalog WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT * FROM product_catalog WHERE category ='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_catalog ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT SUM(sales_quantity) AS total_sales FROM sales_history WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT product_name, forecasted_quantity FROM product_catalog JOIN demand_forecast ON product_catalog.product_id = demand_forecast.product_id WHERE forecast_date = '2022-08-01';

SELECT product_name, return_date, quantity_returned FROM product_catalog JOIN returned_products ON product_catalog.product_id = returned_products.product_id WHERE return_date > '2022-06-30' ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM returned_products;
SELECT product_id, return_quantity FROM returned_products WHERE return_quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT * FROM demand_forecast ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_quantity) AS total_demand FROM historical_data GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT * FROM returned_products WHERE return_date > '2022-01-01' AND return_quantity > 5 ORDER BY return_date DESC

SELECT products.product_name, historical_data.demand_quantity, inventory.stock_quantity FROM products JOIN historical_data ON products.product_id = historical_data.product_id JOIN inventory ON products.product_id = inventory.product_id WHERE historical_data.demand_quantity > 100 AND inventory.stock_quantity < 50
SELECT MAX(unit_price) AS max_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_price FROM products GROUP BY category HAVING MAX(unit_price) - MIN(unit_price) > 100

SELECT products.product_name, AVG(demand_quantity) AS avg_demand FROM products JOIN historical_data ON products.product_id = historical_data.product_id GROUP BY products.product_name HAVING AVG(demand_quantity) > 50
